metadata.name: Hagar 1
metadata.description:
Untitled (from Hagar serie) | Photography | 4724x3544px | 300dpi | NFT Ed.1  | 2007-2022 

The serie Hagar was inspired by the poem "The Slaveship" by Castro Alves, more specifically in the excerpt that mentions the slave Hagar in the desert:

"They are unfortunate women
Like Hagar was too
Whom thirsty, broken,
From far… very far come
Bringing with feeble steps,
Children and chains in the arms,
In the soul - tears and bitterness…
Like Hagar suffering greatly,
That even no milk of lament
Have they to offer Ishmael."
